favourite.article: HE is my God now and forever, Amen!
Amen .There's no crisis that He can't bear, there's no storm He can't abate.
Amen! Loved this song through out my time with the Lord! He is My God and My Savior! Praise the Lord!!! He will always be with me, and there is nothing that him and I together can't do!!!
Praise the Lord that He is most faithful loving one. Preserve us O God. Thank You Lord Jesus, You're everything to us. OH LORD JESUS!
Thank God for Your grace.
Thank You Lord, You are here for me tomorrow. You grace is sufficient for today and tomorrow.
Bless the Lord oh my soul, and let everything around me bless His Holy name.
Amen.
He's my God.
I like this song.
Praise the Lord that He is the most faithful and loving One. Praise the Lord for the Body of Christ!!
Hallelujah!!! I'm a young person to press this on!! Praise the Lord!!
The Lord will take care of us as He is taking care of us now. Praise Him for His faithfulness! Hallelujah!
Oh Lord Jesus! This Song reminds that our Lord will be there for us tomorrow and there is no need to worry about tomorrow. The Lord will take care of us and tomorrow.

O Lord Jesus, I know and humbly say to You my God, that You are still waiting me to do my promise to You. You did Your part and Your blessing and love for me is pouring. Nothing has changed but me. Lord help me to do things right and pleasing for You. Even many years passed by You're still knocking in my heart. No matter where success brought me I feel the emptiness and it's You who only fills my heart. Lead me Lord to the deal I've promised You. You're my God forever and for eternity. Pray for me, my God.

Thank You Lord for this inspiring hymn. Thank You Lord for such an assurance. How I long that all the hindrances be removed that we can be restored to the proper church life. how I long for the meetings and the brothers and sisters. I love You Lord Jesus.

Reading Liam's comment reminded me of a young Christian friend that is on Facebook. This is his most recent post: "My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness. Therefore I will boast all the more gladly about my weaknesses, so that Christ's power may rest on me. 10 That is why, for Christ's sake, I delight in weaknesses, in insults, in hardships, in persecutions, in difficulties. For when I am weak, then I am strong." ~ 2 Corinthians 12:9-10
We should not worry for the coming day, because our God is there for us tomorrow as He is for us today. Gone are the days for anxiety, cares and tears, for God is "here". He's our God!!!

Wow I really love this song!
"There's no crisis that He can't bear, There's no storm He can't abate; He's my God!"
Man, I feel really alone at a school full of atheists but I've really enjoyed reading these comments!

My God is a faithful God! He is also a loving God and His love has conquered me. He never forgets about me and is always there for me. O Lord Jesus! You are eternal, You never change, always with us Your people. We love You Lord! You are my God!

Hallelujah for this song! was preparing this song for children's meeting tomorrow and found myself drown in tears instead singing it for the first time because the words are just so true especially the chorus where I could really relate to my current state of living. Praise Him for He is Lord! =)
He's my God... my one and only God...

This hymn really gives me comfort whenever I sing it... GOD is always here for us from the morning 'til the evening and even tomorrow..
To share to you, this is my favorite line.." day by day His grace grows dearer, His love has conquered me."...
In fact, one morning while still on bed singing it, my brother woke up and said," Repeat it again...it's nice to hear."

This song is the first song that really comes out in my mind every time I'm down and feeling blue. It comforts me a lot. The Lord speaks to me through this song and it eases/soothes me. HE is really our great COMFORTER! Praise HIM over and over again! Amen.
Sister CL shared this song..saints had endlessly shared to me hymns after hymns from this site. Praise the Lord! He dealt with my past and is my present and my glorious future!

Praise the Lord! NOW that we know... You are the only God for us. We really love You, Lord! Thank You for Your unchanging love, faithfulness, mercy and grace given to us. We just want to give more of ourselves to You!

DAY BY DAY His grace grows dearer; His love has conquered me, Never leaving, never ceasing, His Spirit CONSTANTLY FLOODING ME, RICH and FREE!
Praise the Lord for we could have such an experience of Him!
Yesterday, today, forever...He's MY God!

"Our dear Lord is UNCHANGING."
How we need to behold His face from the morning to the evening that we may experience His lovingkindness and great mercy all day long.

He is my God, as Rev. 7:16, 17 say, "They will not hunger anymore, neither will they thirst anymore, neither will the sun beat upon them, nor any hear; For the Lamb who is in the midst of the throne will shepherd them and guide them to springs of waters of life; and God will wipe away every tear form their eyes." Lord, we love You! You are always there to shepherd us!
I like this song because this song causes us to go on in pursuing the Lord even in the midst of obstacles and trials. Amen. Lord, I still love You in spite of my suffering. Oh Lord Jesus, I love You.
Praise the Lord saints that He is our God. The living Father, moving Son and working Spirit. Hallellujah that our God is the living, moving and working Triune God within us!!!!!!!! Amen

God is there for me tomorrow As He is for me today Amen. O Lord Jesus! Hallelujah! You're my God, Lord. From morning to the evening Your mercy is reaching me You are brighter than the brightest sunlight Sweeter and the sweetest delight Your words are in my heart.
He's my God!

It's comforting to know that although people we know may come and go, and the world may fade away, the Lord is always there for us. All we have to do is call on Him. O Lord Jesus! We never have to walk through the darkness alone.
A very beautiful song, both the lyrics and the tune.
Amen. Day by day His grace grows dearer. His love has conquered me. Amen. His MY God.
He's my God! He's my GOD!
Amen!! whatever I do, and wherever I go, HE'S MY GOD!!! And no one can ever take Him away from me...!!

Thank you Lord, you're faithful even when I'm faithless; and I know, now I KNOW you are always there for me no matter what the situation may be. Despite how stubborn or how fallen I am you'll never leave me. I believe in your promise Lord! You will not cast out those who come to You because You are so loving and faithful. I LOVE YOU LORD JESUS!
Now i know.. He is there for me..
PRAISE THAT LORD! THAT HE IS OUR GOD! THE ALL INCLUSIVE CHRIST! AMEN! and I know...now I know

"and I know.. now I know.."
My experience with this song has always been a sweet progression, building up faith and trust in our Father, Savior, and Friend. <3

This song is so sweet! When I first heard this I played it over and over and over. It still is so wonderful to hear everytime. Hallelujah, God is there for me tomorrow as He is for me today! We have such a Faithful God!

He's our God forever!!!until the end of time...i really love singing this hymn esp when we are in the young peoples training and conference in iligan...this hymn is so enjoyable!!through this hymn,we can enjoy the riches of the all inclusive CHRIST....HALLELUJAH!

It's such an encouraging and comforting song to me. Sometimes I feel so bad and empty deep within, I just remember that the Lord is always there for me, He never leave us alone! Thank you Lord, You are always so faithful to us!

The song speaks of God's faithfulness. He is the never changing God. He is the same yesterday, today and tomorrow. By God's grace and mercy how could we be anxious as He has become our life, life-supply, and our everything... I am very happy that He is MY GOD!!!! AMEN!!!
I like this song especially tune, so enjoyble to the young people.
This hymn really comforted me and really felt that God there for me yesterday, today & tomorrow... even forever. He is MY GOD in all circumstances. Thank you Lord.
I like the song because forever HE'S MY GOD. Saints, no matter what circumstances we're in, remember everyday is a new day to GRAB the Lord!!! HALLELUJAH!

There are so many tribulations and trials that I encounter everyday but after singing this song, I feel so much encouraged because I know that God is there for me tomorrow as He is for me today. Lord Jesus, I love you. Thank you Lord for being there for me always.
I really enjoy this song! What a joy to hear such a beautiful song.

I enjoyed singing this song when everything seems to be at the dead end. I realize that there is a God who placed me in such a "dead end", not to punish me or to make me suffer, but rather to show me that "God is there for me tomorrow, as He is for me today..." Today, He is here to dispense His riches into me more than ever to make me a little bit more gold, more silver, and more a precious stone. He's truly our God, and He's making us the same as He is in life and in nature to become that bride descending from the heavens-THE NEW JERUSALEM. Let's love Him today!

This song speaks to me very deeply. It tells me that God will always be there for us. Even though we may feel lonely sometimes, we really aren't alone, because God is always there with us. If we feel sad God is there to comfort us. God will be with us always.

Well, this song makes me realize every time that only God can be there for me, wherever I may be, whatever I may be doing! He's all I need!
Do you know why I like this hymn, brothers and sisters? I remember there's one time when I was feeling very down, empty and I was too stubborn and refuse to turn to the Lord no matter what! I felt my love for Him wasn't that strong instead was for other things. But thank God, when I went for the youth mtg, they were singing this hymn.
And praise the Lord, He brought me through that period of time! And now I know only He is there for me always. He is always there to take all our sorrows away when we would just turn to Him! Who can be there for us when we are in school, when we are in the toilet, when we are feeling down? NO ONE but GOD!
Now when I look back, I felt I was really stupid to love something which will soon pass away, which will not give me comfort and rest,who does not even love me that much and give up someone who is always there for me, who love me till the uttermost!
So saints, remember who can be there always to take all your sorrows away? - no one but God! Treasure your everyday with Him and LOVE HIM for He is so precious to us.......
This is a beautiful song! not only the words but also the tune!
